RESUME_TIPS: In your experience section, describe how you utilized **SQL** to automate reporting tasks. Mention specific projects where **SQL** queries helped in generating business intelligence reports, and quantify the time saved or efficiency gained, such as "Automated weekly sales reports using **SQL**, reducing manual effort by 40%."

Add a section detailing your proficiency in **Power BI** or **Tableau**, including specific projects where you developed dashboards to visualize key performance indicators (KPIs). Highlight your ability to create interactive dashboards, such as visualizing inventory turnover or sales trends, to improve decision-making.

In the skills section, include your experience with **Inventory Planning** tools or **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**. Explain how you used these tools to manage inventory levels, track stock movement, and ensure timely replenishments. Quantify your impact, such as reducing stockouts by 15% through effective inventory management.

Expand your skills section by adding **Demand Forecasting** techniques. Explain your familiarity with forecasting models and how you used them to predict future demand accurately. For instance, mention using time series analysis to forecast sales, improving forecast accuracy by 20%.

Include examples of how you applied **ABC classification** or **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)** in your previous roles. Describe how these methods helped optimize inventory levels and reduce carrying costs. For example, mention that implementing **ABC classification** led to a 10% reduction in inventory holding costs.

In your project descriptions, elaborate on how you used **advanced Excel** features like pivot tables and lookups for inventory analysis. Detail how you created models to forecast demand or optimize stock levels, and quantify the improvements achieved, such as a 5% reduction in excess inventory.

Detail your experience with **replenishment** strategies and **allocation** rules in your resume. Explain how you managed **min/max** levels for different products and stores, ensuring optimal stock availability while minimizing holding costs. Quantify the impact, such as "Improved store fill rates by 10% through effective **replenishment** strategies."

Add specific achievements related to **inventory optimization** to your resume. Describe how you identified and proposed actions for slow-moving or overstocked items, and the resulting impact on inventory turnover and working capital efficiency. For example, mention that "Identified and cleared slow-moving inventory, improving inventory turnover by 12%."

Include details on how you monitored stock movement and initiated timely transfers from the central warehouse to retail locations. Mention the use of **omnichannel** strategies to manage inventory across both online and offline channels. Highlight any reduction in stockouts or overstock situations achieved through effective inventory management.

In your experience section, mention any exposure you have to **D2C** (Direct-to-Consumer) brands or e-commerce platforms. Describe how you planned and managed inventory for online sales channels, considering factors like lead times and shipping costs. Quantify the impact on sales or customer satisfaction, such as "Improved online order fulfillment rates by 15% through optimized inventory planning for **D2C** sales."

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Inventory and Reduce Costs
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of inventory management, including techniques to optimize stock levels and reduce costs. Covers EOQ, safety stock, and ABC analysis.
A series of courses covering supply chain planning, sourcing, and inventory management. Learn how to optimize inventory levels, manage risk, and improve supply chain performance.
A free video tutorial covering the basics of inventory management, including different inventory control techniques and inventory accounting methods.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn about forecasting methods, planning processes, and how to implement a demand planning system. Includes statistical forecasting techniques.
Provides an introduction to forecasting methods and techniques. Learn how to analyze time-series data and use statistical models to make predictions.
Explains the basic forecasting models and how to implement them with practical examples.

Power BI.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Power BI - A Complete Introduction [2024]
Power BI.DESCRIPTION: Learn Power BI from scratch and master data visualization. Create interactive dashboards and reports.
Learn to visualize data using Power BI. Create interactive dashboards, charts, and reports.

Power BI.COURSE_NAME: Power BI Full Course - Learn Power BI in 4 Hours | Power BI Tutorial for Beginners | Edureka
Power BI.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive Power BI tutorial for beginners covering the basics of data visualization and dashboard creation.

Tableau.COURSE_NAME: Tableau A-Z: Hands-On Tableau Training For Data Science!
Tableau.DESCRIPTION: Master Tableau for data visualization and business intelligence. Learn to create advanced charts, dashboards, and reports.

Tableau.COURSE_NAME: Data Visualization and Communication with Tableau
Tableau.DESCRIPTION: Learn data visualization techniques with Tableau. Create dashboards, charts, and interactive reports.

Tableau.COURSE_NAME: Tableau Tutorial for Beginners | Tableau Full Course | Tableau Training | Simplilearn
Tableau.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive Tableau tutorial for beginners, covering the basics of data visualization and dashboard creation.

SQL.COURSE_NAME: The Complete SQL Bootcamp 2024: Go from Zero to Hero
SQL.DESCRIPTION: Learn SQL from scratch. Cover basic to advanced concepts, including queries, joins, and database design.
Learn SQL fundamentals for data analysis and manipulation. Query data, create tables, and perform complex analysis.

SQL.COURSE_NAME: SQL Tutorial - Full Database Course for Beginners
SQL.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive SQL tutorial for beginners, covering the basics of database management and query writing.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Introduction to NetSuite ERP. Learn to navigate the platform, set up accounts, and manage inventory.
Covers NetSuite ERP implementation, including configuration, customization, and integration with other systems.
NetSuite Tutorials on YouTube cover all modules of Netsuite.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive course covering Zoho CRM, including setup, customization, and automation.
Learn how to use Zoho Analytics for data visualization, reporting, and business intelligence.
Youtube tutorial to learn Zoho CRM features and implementation.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to setup and use Unicommerce.
Learn how to setup and use different ERPs.
Learn how to setup and use Unicommerce.
